channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped and weeds/plants pile up, 7th July
item.description:
Weeds and plants have been dumped to the side of the fence and people are throwing cans, bottles and takeaway boxes here. 3 black bin bags on opposite side have been dumped also.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Hart Dyke Road, St Mary's, Swanley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside Dickens house, 7th July
item.description:
Private company have installed 3 electric charging meters last week. The meters are installed but the pavement is not even and the paving stone is not put in the correct place.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7-11, Herbrand Street, Saint Pancras, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Glasson pavement, 7th July
item.description:
Broken glass bottles at bus stop opposite 139 pickford lane very dangerous to people sitting at bus stop and dogs walking on pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Lane, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Poster advertising Pavilion Drives and Patios, 7th July
item.description:
This poster appeared on or around 1st July 2025 and was reported previously (reference number 7802841). The poster is still in place, despite the complaint response alleging that the matter has been resolved.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 188, Long Lane, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hanging branch Marlborough Park entrance Marlborough Park Avenue, 7th July
item.description:
A branch is hanging down covering the footpath to the entrance of Marlborough Park on Marlborough Park Avenue. Please can this removed asap as it could be dangerous but also blocking access.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Marlborough Park Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Fridge freezer left outside garage in Felton Lea
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Felton Lea, Longlands, Sidcup, London

item.title: Access alleyway behing houses on Westmount Road/Grangehill Road, 7th July
item.description:
The rear access road to the houses back garages is blocked and overgrown with brambles, is pushing many of the rear garden fences on Granby Road over into residents gardens, really bad down by 81/83 Granby Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Granby Road, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rain Water Backing Up, 7th July
item.description:
It appears there is a blocked drain as the rain water was 'pooling' this morning

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, Droop Street, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flood in Churton Place, SW1V 2LN since yesterday., 7th July
item.description:
Not sure of cause this time, but last time it happened it was due to builders in street putting things down drain that blocked it. The danger is flooding to our pavement vaults, many of which have central heating boilers etc in them, so needs URGENT ATTENTION tHANKS

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churton Place, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kitchen electric appliance and assorted building waste, 7th July
item.description:
I reported this 3 months ago .unit is very heavy and we have council workmen coming to fix our fence which they can't get to because of the rubbish .it is in mercer close on left side .thanking you in advance.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mercers Close, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drug and rubbish paraphernalia Lisson Gardens, 7th July
item.description:
Large amount of drug and associated refuse by the children’s open play area of Lisson Street Gardens (behind King Solomon’s School). Open space looks like a trash dump, totally unacceptable for children’s and any person to sit relax and play. A dangerous or decaying place, I pity staff who will be asked to clean this filth.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lisson Street, St. John's Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen tree, 7th July
item.description:
Overnight branches have broken off the tree outside the community church and they are blocking the road and garages at the end of Stanhope Road (the no through road end). The tree is not growing on private property but on the pavement.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanhope Road, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 7th July
item.description:
Two pallets left on pavement blocking access.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Marmadon Road, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The cycle lights are stuck on red, 7th July
item.description:
Twice in the last week I have been sat in the bike lane waiting for the lights and over 3 cycles of light changes have gone without the bike lights changing, leaving a group of cyclists stuck in the middle of the roundabout and having to make dangerous choices to get through the lights. I don't know if these lights are on sensors but on both occasions there have been at least 4 cyclists waiting. Please fix this as it's going to end in an accident, if it hasn't already
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Street Roundabout, Hoxton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping of various rubbish and broken up plastic o/s Friends for Bexley in Pickford Lane, 7th July
item.description:
Flytipping of various rubbish and broken up plastic o/s Friends for Bexley in Pickford Lane - please can this be picked up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Pickford Lane, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing bin store doors, fly tipping and mess, 7th July
item.description:
I’ve reported this before and been told that the bin store door parts are on order, but this door has been missing for many months. Could an alternative solution be found please. The area is unsightly and constantly messy.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Church Crescent, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned bike, 7th July
item.description:
This bike has been here for MONTHS, having asked all the neighbours in the area, no one knows whose it is. It is attached to our building and we want it gone, it obstructs the street as well.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Blurton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken drain cover, 7th July
item.description:
Broken drain cover in middle of the road junction with Kelvin grove. Needs fixing ASAP before a bus or car has a incident here
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 94, Kirkdale, Forest Hill, London
